free: #e Hello, everyone.
#c 大家好。
#n sabau: 你好，平安，辛苦了。(用於舊識) makanangelre：大家。此為問候語。
#e Today, I would like to say… that when I was a little child in Vedai.
#c 今天。這個，我要說…就是當時我小時候在霧台的時候。
#n 需再確認
#n 需再確認
#e I like Vedai very much.
#c 我很喜歡霧台。
#e When I was a child and in Vedai，(it is) lovely and happy.
#c 當我們小時候在霧台的時候呢，非常歡樂也充滿愛。
#e How to say? When I was a child, I should follow the seniors to go to field.
#c 怎麼說呢？當小時候(在霧台)時，要跟長輩去田裡。
#n 此處柯老師澄清：霧台女性會去田裡工作，與杜傳老師所說的不同。
#e When students are in holiday; then (they) leave for field, the children leave, and follow their grandmother and grandfather.
#c 當學生放假時。然後去(田裡)的時候，小孩去的時候，跟著祖母祖父。
#e Collecting the millet, sweet potato, and taro.
#c 收小米、地瓜、芋頭。
#n pagai: 米，植物前的ki表採收的意思。但malra ka/kudra/*ki laimai 收衣服。kacaimu馬鈴薯。kurai：芋頭乾。bava：酒。
#e Then, (we) camp in the field.
#c (我們)要在田裡過夜。
#e 拿完全部的食物後回家。
#c 這裡發音人表示自己當時有些不知所云，重複很多次。
#e (We) can’t play when (we) go home.
#c 我們回到家的時候也不能玩。
#e When I recall, there is no time to play in childhood.
#c 當我回想的時候呢。小時候沒有玩耍的時間。
#n dreme:想 ki-dreme-dreme 回想 ba-renge-renge 想念(某人)
#e When (we) go home, (we) go to the river (bank).
#c 我們回到家的時候呢，然後就去溪流(邊)。
#e At the river (bank), we go (into) the river to wash the cloth.
#c 在溪流時，去溪裡洗衣服。
#n 霧台部落於20年前才引進洗衣機。
#e Before, there is no water in home and (we) come (home), no water to use.
#c 從前家裡沒有水。到(家)的時候沒有水用。
#e Before, we go to the river to wash clothes.
#c 以前去河流洗衣服。
#e We go to the river to bring water to make rice.
#c 我們去河邊提水來做飯。
#e When washing the floor and use…, water is for washing.
#c 當要洗地板或要做任何…(提)水為了任何要洗的東西。
#n dralri 石板(也作地板)。mabulathe：絕後(沒有後代)者。
#e After the bringing, (we) should start to wipe the floor
#c 提水回來後要開始掃地。
#e Then, cook.
#c 然後要煮飯。
#e When (we) are children, when we want to cook, we need to start a fire.
#c 當小時候要煮飯的時候要起火。
#e When I start a fire, my sister Lavausu
#c 當我起火時，我姐姐 Lavausu
#n kaka包含哥哥，姐姐，堂哥，堂姐，表哥，表姊。Lavausu ：(魯凱貴族頭目家次女名)
#e (She) cook the sweet potato. We wash this sweet potato and cook rice.
#c 她煮地瓜。我們先洗地瓜然後煮飯。
#e When eating in the childhood, (we) do not have salt and there is no bowl.
#c 當小時候吃飯的時候，不用鹽也沒有碗。
#e All together (we) eat breakfast, lunch, and dinner around the iron pot.
#c 一起在鐵鍋吃早餐，吃晚餐，吃午餐。
#n 魯凱族人一天吃三餐，與當時閩南族群不同。
#e That is very interesting.
#c 那是非常有趣的。
#e When children (get) together, (we) wash clothes in the river
#c 當小時候聚在一起時，在河邊洗衣服。
#e When we were children and went to school; I recall that there was no shoes. We go to school with barefoot.
#c 當我們小時候要去學校的時候呢，我回想起來(那時)沒有鞋子，赤腳去學校。
#n 當時環境使然，全班多數人均無鞋子。當時霧台並無一般性商店。直到發音人國中時才有小型鞋店。
#e (We) were taught in the school
#c 在學校上課。
#e As I recall, our school is made with thatch.
#c 我回想起來，我們的學校是用茅草蓋的。
#n tu-dane 為蓋房子的意思。
#e When ten years (passed); ten years passed.
#c 十年後，過十年後。
#e (We) use cement to build school.
#c 用水泥蓋學校。
#n sumindu：水泥，由日語借字而來。
#e When we build the school, all the student go to river to take sand and take stones.
#c 當我們蓋學校的時候呢，全部學生到河邊拿沙子，拿沙石。
#n tukudru背，tukudru ku enai 背沙子。enai 沙子，barasi：沙石。
#e We take stones, all the student.
#c 我們採砂石，所有的學生。
#e Exactly, our school of Vedai is (build).
#c 我們霧台國小就這樣成立了。
#n 魯凱族沒有針對各級學校的分類詞，這裡的gaku指的是霧台國小。
#e (After we have) school, we sweep
#c (有)學校後，我們要掃地。
#e We start to sweep. There are times (when) we sweep; there are no (broom)
#c 我們開始掃地，有時候掃地時，沒有(掃把)用。

gloss: 名物化-重疊-放假-名物化

free: #e On holidays, we go to mountains far away to cut broom.
#c 放假的時候呢, 去很遠的山上砍掃把。
#n kavai拉長表示很遠的山上。
#e Making broom with bamboo, We, all the students, go to make the broom and use on school.
#c 用竹子作掃把。我們所有的學生去做掃把，做完成後的掃把就用在學校。
#e I recall when we where in Vedai, we, students, (get) together as long as doing anything.
#c 我想當我們在霧台的時候呢，只要做任何事情都一起做。
#e One can not (be along)
#c 不會一個人。
#e (We) play toys together.
#c 一起玩。
#e (We) sing together.
#c 一起唱歌。
#e Very wonderful.
#c 很美好。
#e (We go) back home but can not rest; we need to help female seniors and male seniors.
#c 回家時不能休息，要做事和幫長輩們。
#e (We) would help grandmother to clean the house.
#c 要幫忙祖母和整理家事。
#n kaingu-li ka tina ki ina(外婆) kaingu-li tina ki ama(奶奶)
#e In particular, when I recall we sleep at night.
#c 尤其當我想到我們晚上睡覺的時候呢。
#e When (it is) at night, the sleeping time, (we) often can’t sleep early for playing.
#c 晚上睡覺的時候，常為了要玩不能早睡。

#n avava 玩具，vangevange 擾亂 wa-vangevange=su nakuane(你擾亂我) pakiamama=su nakuane (你誤導我)。sara wa-kane madu ku aga 要早點吃飯喔, sara wa-kane ku aga 某人早點吃飯。魯凱族人晚上常於八點鐘左右就睡覺，據發音人表示十點就算晚睡，迄今(2011)霧台鄉依舊如此。Madu 的語意與句法功能需再確認。
#e In partucular when thw ceremony takes place.
#c 尤其是要舉行祭典的時候。
#n tangi-drakakalane 豐年祭，據發音人表示西魯凱人常用此說法。IU133之Tu-lrisi為東魯凱之說法。為何用drakale(起立，把東西立起來，成立)，是因為要早起舉行慶典。ingi-drakele ka gaku ki sua-Vedai：成立霧台學校。
#e There are no light balls then even when we want to go to church, the ancient time.
#c 就算要去教會也沒有電燈，從前那時候。
#e In the anceint tome when (we) leaving for go to church or join the ceremony.
#c 以前去教會或參加慶典時。
#e (We) need to build a fire to light up the torch.
#c 要用火點著火把。
#e (we) use this fire to go to church or ceremony when (it is) at night, just like light bulbs.
#c 當晚上時用這火去教會或祭典，就像電燈。
#e (It is) wonderful (even when) there is no light bulbs.
#c 沒有電燈仍舊美好。
#e When we were children in hometown, there are no things to worried (about).
#c 當我們在家鄉是小孩時，我們沒有擔心的事情。
#e When we were children in hometown, there are no things to worried (about) and pressure.
#c 當我們在家鄉是小孩時，我們沒有擔心的事情或壓力。
#n Kualri 是”累”的意思。kipakualrialri是有壓力/有煩惱之意。Kai Takanau kiapakualrialri 是「Takanau有壓力/很累」之意。此動詞不能使用重疊型加強語意，而僅能用重音加強。
#e The students (in tribe) get together, like family.
#c (部落的)學生都在一起，像家人一樣。
#n wa-ceke-cekele意為「家裡人」。
#e In particular, when we were children, my elder siblings… My brother named Takanau. My sister named Lavausu.
#c 由其是當我們小時候，我兄姐…我哥叫Takanau，我姐叫Lavausu。
#e When we don’t listen, (they) taught us not to do.
#c 當我們不聽話時，(他們)教我們別這麼作。
#e They need to learn everyone, and teach junior siblings to...well...sweep.
#c 他們要學習大家和教育弟妹…嗯…掃地。
#e Teach how to grow taro.
#c 教(如何)種芋頭。
#e (You) need to follow grandmother to the field.
#c 跟著祖母去田裡。
#e It is the time (when) everyone of the siblings go to the field.
#c 這時候兄弟姊妹大家要一起去田裡。
#e We collect taros, sweet potatoes, and millet, and siblings that get together are wonderful.
#c 我們收芋頭，收番薯，收小米，兄弟姊妹們在一起很美好。
#e Families were in hometown then.
#c 家人那時在故鄉。
#e Now the time in (my) childhood does not exist.
#c 現在像我童年的時光已不存在了。
#e All the children are in the city.
#c 小孩都在平地。
#n pairan平地人(尤指閩南人)，ciukuku 外省人。ngaingai 客家人。 yakaipairan 在平地。
#e (They) do not have the time when children play like before, and are not as happy as in the hometown
#c 沒有像過去小孩玩耍的時光，也沒有在家鄉那麼快樂。
#e I think I like the time when we were children that lives in Rukai tribe.
#c 我想我喜歡當我們小時候住在魯凱部落的時光。
#e Thank you.
#c 謝謝。
